titles.title: Rancho Corral de Tierra Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act

A bill to revise the boundaries of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area in the State of California, to restore and extend the term of the advisory commission for the recreation area, and for other purposes.
Rancho Corral de Tierra Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
Rancho Corral de Tierra Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act
Rancho Corral de Tierra Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici without amendment. With written report No. 108-15.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 27.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Rancho Corral de Tierra Golden Gate National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Act - Modifies the boundaries of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area in California to include specified additional lands. Allows the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain of those lands only from a willing seller.Extends the termination date of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area Advisory Commission until ten years after the enactment date of this Act.
